about_the_game:
Unleash the Leash in Doggy Dungeons!


Your human's vanished, leaving you, their furry best friend, stranded in a world gone wild!

Don't despair, pup (or kitty, or birby friend!), but his ain't your comfy living room anymore. It's time to unleash your inner hero and fight your way back home!

Explore a Wagging World:


  • Sniff your way through sprawling fields, shadowy forests, and even creepier sewers!
  • Brave monster-infested graveyards and forgotten ruins – no biome is off-limits for a determined pet on a mission!

Fight Like a Furever Friend:


  • Outsmart enemies with cunning cardplay! Combine your natural animal instincts with powerful cards to unleash epic combos.
  • Face down ferocious foes at the end of each biome. Prove you're more than just a pampered pooch (or fancy feline) – you're a force to be reckoned with!

Collect & Conquer:


  • Uncover a treasure trove of unique cards as you explore.
  • Experiment, build pawsome decks, and discover unstoppable synergies. No two paws fight the same!
  • Show the world that even the cutest critters can be ferocious fighters.

Get Home Safe & Sound:


  • You might be lost, but you're never scared! You've gotten yourself out of sticky situations before, and you'll do it again!
  • Embark on an unforgettable adventure filled with danger, discovery, and the unwavering love for your human.

Doggy Dungeons is a card-battling adventure game where you, the adorable yet fierce pet, take center stage. So put on your brave face (or your fiercest meow!), grab your deck, and get ready to fight, explore, and find your way home in this heartwarming adventure about the unbreakable bond between a pet and its human.

name: Doggy Dungeons

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: i5-6500 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: i7-7700 3.6GHz
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1650
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Your human's missing & you're unleashed into a wild world! Explore the wilds, fight with cunning cardplay, and build the purrfect deck to conquer foes in this heartwarming adventure. Find your way home & prove you're more than just a pampered pet - you're a hero!
